Description: On I-64 at mile marker 187 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 163.2 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
